name: Chaotic Space
description:
Survive Meteors in space while Bringing Chaos upon the galaxy.

This game is my entry for the Brackeys game jam 2021.2.

Hey there!

Im a 17 Year old game developer with a lot of unity expirience.

i wanted to participate in a game jam since i was 13 so im really happy i could join for this one.

have fun!
